peliculas.Title: Avatar
peliculas.Description: A music-loving kinkajou named Vivo embarks on the journey of a lifetime to fulfill his destiny and deliver a love song for an old friend.

peliculas.Title: Titanic
peliculas.Description: A music-loving kinkajou named Vivo embarks on the journey of a lifetime to fulfill his destiny and deliver a love song for an old friend.

peliculas.Title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
peliculas.Description: A music-loving kinkajou named Vivo embarks on the journey of a lifetime to fulfill his destiny and deliver a love song for an old friend.

peliculas.Title: Vivo
peliculas.Description: A music-loving kinkajou named Vivo embarks on the journey of a lifetime to fulfill his destiny and deliver a love song for an old friend.

peliculas.Title: El escuadrón suicida
peliculas.Description: Los supervillanos Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker y una colección de estafadores locos en la prisión de Belle Reve se unen al súper secreto y sombrío Task Force X cuando los dejan en la remota isla de Corto Maltese, infundida por enemigos.

peliculas.Title: Viuda negra
peliculas.Description: Natasha Romanoff, también conocida como Black Widow, se enfrenta a las partes más oscuras de su libro mayor cuando surge una peligrosa conspiración vinculada a su pasado. Perseguida por una fuerza que no se detendrá ante nada para derribarla, Natasha debe lidiar con su historia como espía y las relaciones rotas que dejaron a su paso mucho antes de convertirse en Vengadora.

peliculas.Title: PAW Patrol: The Movie
peliculas.Description: Ryder and the pups are called to Adventure City to stop Mayor Humdinger from turning the bustling metropolis into a state of chaos, to insure “law and order”.

peliculas.Title: Old
peliculas.Description: A group of families on a tropical holiday discover that the secluded beach where they are staying is somehow causing them to age rapidly – reducing their entire lives into a single day.

peliculas.Title: Luca
peliculas.Description: Luca and his best friend Alberto experience an unforgettable summer on the Italian Riviera. But all the fun is threatened by a deeply-held secret: they are sea monsters from another world just below the water’s surface.

peliculas.Title: Rurouni Kenshin: The Beginning
peliculas.Description: Before he was a protector, Kenshin was a fearsome assassin known as Battosai. But when he meets the gentle Tomoe Yukishiro, a beautiful young woman who carries a huge burden in her heart which would change the life of Battosai forever.

peliculas.Title: The Boss Baby: Family Business
peliculas.Description: The Templeton brothers — Tim and his Boss Baby little bro Ted — have become adults and drifted away from each other. But a new boss baby with a cutting-edge approach and a can-do attitude is about to bring them together again … and inspire a new family business.

peliculas.Title: The Exorcism of Carmen Farias
peliculas.Description: Carmen, a brave journalist, discovers soon after her mother's death that she has inherited her grandma's house. She decides to move there without knowing it hides dark secrets.

peliculas.Title: Miraculous World: Shanghai – The Legend of Ladydragon
peliculas.Description: On school break, Marinette heads to Shanghai to meet Adrien. But after arriving, Marinette loses all her stuff, including the Miraculous that allows her to turn into Ladybug!

peliculas.Title: Resort to Love
peliculas.Description: Aspiring pop star Erica ends up as the entertainment at her ex-fiancé’s wedding after reluctantly taking a gig at a luxurious island resort while in the wake of a music career meltdown.

peliculas.Title: Raya y el último dragón
peliculas.Description: Hace mucho tiempo, en el mundo de fantasía de Kumandra, los humanos y los dragones vivían juntos en armonía. Pero cuando una fuerza maligna amenazó la tierra, los dragones se sacrificaron para salvar a la humanidad. Ahora, 500 Years después, ese mismo mal ha regresado y depende de un guerrero solitario, Raya, rastrear al legendario último dragón para restaurar la tierra fracturada y su pueblo dividido.

peliculas.Title: Aftermath
peliculas.Description: Desperate to save their marriage, a young couple takes a deal to move into their dream home, but disturbing events reveal the house's troubled history.

peliculas.Title: The Croods: A New Age
peliculas.Description: Searching for a safer habitat, the prehistoric Crood family discovers an idyllic, walled-in paradise that meets all of its needs. Unfortunately, they must also learn to live with the Bettermans -- a family that's a couple of steps above the Croods on the evolutionary ladder. As tensions between the new neighbors start to rise, a new threat soon propels both clans on an epic adventure that forces them to embrace their differences, draw strength from one another, and survive together.

peliculas.Title: Sugar Daddy
peliculas.Description: When a struggling musician can't afford her rent, she signs up for a website where rich older men pay to date younger women. Her new money-making venture sends her down a dark rabbit hole that forces her to grow up fast, shaping her music, and how she sees the world.

peliculas.Title: El dragón de los deseos
peliculas.Description: El decidido adolescente Din anhela volver a conectarse con su mejor amigo de la infancia cuando conoce a un dragón que concede deseos y le muestra la magia de las posibilidades.

peliculas.Title: La guerra del mañana
peliculas.Description: El mundo se sorprende cuando un grupo de viajeros en el tiempo llega desde el Year 2051 para entregar un mensaje urgente: Treinta Years en el futuro, la humanidad está perdiendo una guerra global contra una especie alienígena mortal. La única esperanza de supervivencia es que los soldados y civiles del presente sean transportados al futuro y se unan a la lucha. Entre los reclutados se encuentra el maestro de escuela secundaria y hombre de familia Dan Forester. Decidido a salvar el mundo para su pequeña hija, Dan se une a un científico brillante y su padre separado en una búsqueda desesperada para reescribir el destino del planeta.

peliculas.Title: Monster Pets: A Hotel Transylvania Short
peliculas.Description: Drac tries out some new monster pets to help occupy Tinkles for playtime.

peliculas.Title: Rapido y Furioso F9
peliculas.Description: Dominic Toretto y su tripulación luchan contra el asesino más hábil y el conductor de alto rendimiento que jamás hayan conocido: su hermano abandonado.

peliculas.Title: Space Jam: A New Legacy
peliculas.Description: When LeBron and his young son Dom are trapped in a digital space by a rogue A.I., LeBron must get them home safe by leading Bugs, Lola Bunny and the whole gang of notoriously undisciplined Looney Tunes to victory over the A.I.'s digitized champions on the court. It's Tunes versus Goons in the highest-stakes challenge of his life.

peliculas.Title: Cruella
peliculas.Description: In 1984 London amidst the punk rock revolution, a young grifter named Estella is determined to make a name for herself with her designs. She befriends a pair of young thieves who appreciate her appetite for mischief, and together they are able to build a life for themselves on the London streets. One day, Estella’s flair for fashion catches the eye of the Baroness von Hellman, a fashion legend who is devastatingly chic and terrifyingly haute. But their relationship sets in motion a course of events and revelations that will cause Estella to embrace her wicked side and become the raucous, fashionable and revenge-bent Cruella.

peliculas.Title: Spirit Untamed
peliculas.Description: Lucky Prescott's life is changed forever when she moves from her home in the city to a small frontier town and befriends a wild mustang named Spirit..

peliculas.Title: Gabriel's Inferno Part II
peliculas.Description: Professor Gabriel Emerson finally learns the truth about Julia Mitchell's identity, but his realization comes a moment too late. Julia is done waiting for the well-respected Dante specialist to remember her and wants nothing more to do with him. Can Gabriel win back her heart before she finds love in another's arms?

peliculas.Title: Soul
peliculas.Description: Joe Gardner es un maestro de escuela secundaria al que le encanta la música jazz. Después de un exitoso concierto en el Half Note Club, de repente sufre un accidente que separa su alma de su cuerpo y es transportado al You Seminar, un centro en el que las almas se desarrollan y adquieren pasiones antes de ser transportadas a un recién nacido. Joe debe obtener ayuda de las otras almas en entrenamiento, como 22, un alma que ha pasado eones en el Seminario You, para poder regresar a la Tierra.

peliculas.Title: Life in a Year
peliculas.Description: A 17 year old finds out that his girlfriend is dying, so he sets out to give her an entire life, in the last year she has left.

peliculas.Title: La familia Mitchells Vs las máquinas
peliculas.Description: El viaje por carretera de una familia peculiar y disfuncional se trastorna cuando se encuentran en medio del apocalipsis de los robots y de repente se convierten en la última esperanza más improbable de la humanidad.

peliculas.Title: The Dark Knight
peliculas.Description: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known to the terrified citizens of Gotham as the Joker.

peliculas.Title: Trollhunters: Rise of the Titans
peliculas.Description: Arcadia may look like an ordinary town, but it lies at the center of magical and mystical lines that makes it a nexus for many battles among otherworldly creatures, including trolls, aliens, and wizards. Now, various heroes will team-up in an epic adventure where they must fight the Arcane Order for control over the magic that binds them all together.

peliculas.Title: Infinito
peliculas.Description: Evan McCauley tiene habilidades que nunca aprendió y recuerdos de lugares que nunca ha visitado. Automedicado y al borde de un colapso mental, un grupo secreto que se hace llamar Infinitos acuden a su rescate, revelando que sus recuerdos son reales.

peliculas.Title: Peter Rabbit 2: El fugitivos
peliculas.Description: Bea, Thomas y los conejos han creado una familia improvisada, pero a pesar de sus mejores esfuerzos, Peter parece no poder deshacerse de su traviesa reputación. Aventurándose fuera del jardín, Peter se encuentra en un mundo donde sus travesuras son apreciadas, pero cuando su familia arriesga todo para venir a buscarlo, Peter debe descubrir qué tipo de conejito quiere ser.

peliculas.Title: The Last Mercenary
peliculas.Description: A mysterious former secret service agent must urgently return to France when his estranged son is falsely accused of arms and drug trafficking by the government, following a blunder by an overzealous bureaucrat and a mafia operation.

peliculas.Title: Hotel Transylvania: Transformania
peliculas.Description: When Van Helsing's mysterious invention, the Monsterfication Ray, goes haywire, Drac and his monster pals are all transformed into humans, and Johnny becomes a monster. In their new mismatched bodies, Drac and Johnny must team up and race across the globe to find a cure before it's too late, and before they drive each other crazy.

peliculas.Title: Godzilla vs. Kong
peliculas.Description: In a time when monsters walk the Earth, humanity’s fight for its future sets Godzilla and Kong on a collision course that will see the two most powerful forces of nature on the planet collide in a spectacular battle for the ages.

peliculas.Title: Barbie & Chelsea the Lost Birthday
peliculas.Description: Enjoy high-sea thrills as Barbie, Chelsea and the rest of the Roberts family set sail on an adventure cruise. Barbie & Chelsea The Lost Birthday tells the story of Chelsea, Barbie’s precocious youngest sister, and the rest of the Roberts family as they set sail on an adventure cruise for her seventh birthday. When they cross the International Date Line, Chelsea discovers her actual birthday has been lost and she embarks on a fantastical journey through an enchanted jungle island in order to save it.

peliculas.Title: Mortal Kombat
peliculas.Description: El desgastado luchador de MMA Cole Young, inconsciente de su herencia y perseguido por el mejor guerrero del emperador Shang Tsung, Sub-Zero, busca y entrena con los mayores campeones de la Tierra mientras se prepara para enfrentarse a los enemigos de Outworld en una batalla de alto riesgo por el universo.

peliculas.Title: Coco
peliculas.Description: A pesar de la desconcertante prohibición de la música por generaciones, Miguel sueña con convertirse en un músico consumado como su ídolo, Ernesto de la Cruz. Desesperado por demostrar su talento, Miguel se encuentra en la deslumbrante y colorida Tierra de los Muertos siguiendo una misteriosa cadena de eventos. En el camino, conoce al encantador tramposo Héctor, y juntos emprenden un viaje extraordinario para descubrir la verdadera historia detrás de la historia familiar de Miguel.

peliculas.Title: A Perfect Fit
peliculas.Description: Sparks fly when a fashion blogger in Bali meets a gifted shoemaker, leading her to question her commitment to her fiancé.

peliculas.Title: Maya the Bee: The Golden Orb
peliculas.Description: When Maya, a headstrong little bee, and her best friend Willi, rescue an ant princess they find themselves in the middle of an epic bug battle that will take them to strange new worlds and test their friendship to its limits..

peliculas.Title: Paternidad
peliculas.Description: Un nuevo padre viudo se enfrenta a las dudas, los miedos, la angustia y los pañales sucios mientras se dispone a criar a su hija por su cuenta. Inspirado en una historia real.

peliculas.Title: Secret Magic Control Agency
peliculas.Description: The Secret Magic Control Agency sends its two best agents, Hansel and Gretel, to fight against the witch of the Gingerbread House.

peliculas.Title: Thunder Force
peliculas.Description: En un mundo donde los supervillanos son algo común, dos mejores amigos de la infancia separados se reúnen después de que uno diseña un tratamiento que les da poderes para proteger su ciudad..

peliculas.Title: We Can Be Heroes
peliculas.Description: When alien invaders capture Earth's superheroes, their kids must learn to work together to save their parents - and the planet.

peliculas.Title: Penguin Bloom
peliculas.Description: Cuando un aliado inesperado ingresa al mundo de la familia Bloom en forma de una urraca bebé herida a la que llaman Penguin, la llegada del ave marca una gran diferencia en la vida de la familia en apuros.

peliculas.Title: Xico's Journey
peliculas.Description: The peace of a small town is endangered when a corporation wants to destroy the mountain that protects them. A girl named Copi and her best friend Xico, a Xoloitzcuintle dog, will go into the mountains to try to save the town.

peliculas.Title: Un lugar tranquilo, parte II
peliculas.Description: Después de los eventos en casa, la familia Abbott ahora se enfrenta a los terrores del mundo exterior. Obligados a aventurarse en lo desconocido, se dan cuenta de que las criaturas que cazan por el sonido no son las únicas amenazas que acechan más allá del camino de arena.

peliculas.Title: 22 vs. Earth
peliculas.Description: Set before the events of ‘Soul’, 22 refuses to go to Earth, enlisting a gang of 5 new souls in attempt of rebellion. However, 22’s subversive plot leads to a surprising revelation about the meaning of life.

peliculas.Title: Crucero por la jungla
peliculas.Description: La Dra. Lily Houghton solicita la ayuda del bromista capitán Frank Wolff para llevarla por el Amazonas en su ruinoso barco. Juntos, buscan un árbol antiguo que tenga el poder de curar, un descubrimiento que cambiará el futuro de la medicina.

peliculas.Title: La película Bob Esponja: Sponge on the Run
peliculas.Description: Cuando su mejor amigo Gary es arrebatado repentinamente, Bob Esponja lleva a Patrick a una misión alocada mucho más allá de Fondo de Bikini para salvar a su amigo de caparazón rosa.
